languages.text: "Я был на волосок от сервиторизации, да. Но один из патрулей подтвердил, что меня не было на месте преступления!"
"I was a hair's breadth away from servitorisation, yes. But one of the patrols confirmed that I wasn't at the scene!"
languages.original_text: "Я был на волосок от сервиторизации, да. Но один из патрулей подтвердил, что меня не было на месте преступления!"

traits.locale_text: "I was a hair's breadth away from servitorisation, yes. But one of the patrols confirmed that I wasn't at the scene!"
"I was a hair's breadth away from servitorisation, yes. But one of the patrols confirmed that I wasn't at the scene!"
"I was a hair's breadth away from servitorisation, yes. But one of the patrols confirmed that I wasn't at the scene!"
"I was a hair's breadth away from servitorisation, yes. But one of the patrols confirmed that I wasn't at the scene!"

languages.text: “没错，我差点就被改造成机仆了，还好其中一个巡逻队员证明我当时不在现场！”
languages.original_text: "I was a hair's breadth away from servitorisation, yes. But one of the patrols confirmed that I wasn't at the scene!"

traits.locale_text: “没错，我差点就被改造成机仆了，还好其中一个巡逻队员证明我当时不在现场！”

languages.text: "Ich stand eine Haaresbreite vor der Servitorisierung, ja. Aber eine der Patrouillen hat bestätigt, dass ich nicht am Tatort war!"
languages.original_text: "I was a hair's breadth away from servitorisation, yes. But one of the patrols confirmed that I wasn't at the scene!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich stand eine Haaresbreite vor der Servitorisierung, ja. Aber eine der Patrouillen hat bestätigt, dass ich nicht am Tatort war!"

languages.text: « J'ai échappé de justesse à la servitorisation, oui. Mais l'une des patrouilles a confirmé que je n'étais pas sur place ! »
languages.original_text: "I was a hair's breadth away from servitorisation, yes. But one of the patrols confirmed that I wasn't at the scene!"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai échappé de justesse à la servitorisation, oui. Mais l'une des patrouilles a confirmé que je n'étais pas sur place ! »

languages.text: «Sí, ha faltado poco para que me servidorizaran. ¡Pero una de las patrullas ha confirmado que no estaba presente en el lugar de los hechos!».
languages.original_text: "I was a hair's breadth away from servitorisation, yes. But one of the patrols confirmed that I wasn't at the scene!"

traits.locale_text: «Sí, ha faltado poco para que me servidorizaran. ¡Pero una de las patrullas ha confirmado que no estaba presente en el lugar de los hechos!».

languages.text: 「確かに私は、サーヴィター化まであと一歩だった。でも、パトロール隊の一人が、私が現場にいなかったことを確認したんだ！」
languages.original_text: "I was a hair's breadth away from servitorisation, yes. But one of the patrols confirmed that I wasn't at the scene!"

traits.locale_text: 「確かに私は、サーヴィター化まであと一歩だった。でも、パトロール隊の一人が、私が現場にいなかったことを確認したんだ！」
